thread.title: 3 free AdWords testing tools to adopt today
thread.title_full: 3 free AdWords testing tools to adopt today

author: Todd Saunders
title: 3 free AdWords testing tools to adopt today
text:
Columnist Todd Saunders discusses the importance of data-fueled decision-making with regard to ad copy and suggests a few tools to help you test and optimize your search ads.

Please visit Marketing Land for the full article.
